section.title: SPM Priority Settings Explained
section.para: The SPM settings table details the information required on the SPM tab of the New Host or Edit Host window.

entry.para: Defines the likelihood that the host will be given the role of Storage Pool Manager (SPM). The options are Low, Normal, and High priority. Low priority means that there is a reduced likelihood of the host being assigned the role of SPM, and High priority means there is an increased likelihood. The default setting is Normal.
